column4: hi, can somebody tell me where I can find the CCSM to change the settings?
if you install the compizconfig-settings-manager it will end up up the system-menu, preferences
thank you
from what I've heard, you're better off installing eclipse from source.. the version in the repos might be out of date

http://popcon.ubuntu.com/

yes

xchat-gnome is a little shinier than xchat.. but doesn't have all the options/menus and stuff
